mapper.select: select blog_id, category_id, title, summary, status, weight, support, header_img, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from bg_blog where blog_id=#{blogId}

select count(*) from bg_blog

select blog_id, category_id, title, summary, status, weight, support, click, header_img, type,content, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from bg_blog where blog_id=#{blogId}

select b.blog_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.summary, b.click, b.header_img, b.create_by, b.create_time, b.support, c.category_title from bg_blog b left join bg_category c on b.category_id = c.category_id where status=1

select blog_id,title from bg_blog where blog_id < #{blogId} and status=1 order by blog_id limit 0,1
select blog_id,title from bg_blog where blog_id > #{blogId} and status=1 order by blog_id desc limit 0,1
select blog_id,title,header_img from bg_blog where status=1 order by rand() limit #{i}
